XenotypeDef.label: Numen
XenotypeDef.description: Numen are the green children of the wastelandâ€”mutants born where nature refused to die. Vines lace their veins, their skin glows faintly with bioluminescent life, and their breath carries the scent of moss and decay. They are patient, serene, and unsettling, speaking softly of the forests that dream beneath the ruins.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Plant-bound humans whose mutation binds flesh and flora into one.
